name: Get That Off Of Me!
description:
Run around as a former knight, trying to sell his armor, while being chase by a bunch of rampaging merchants, who are trying go get great profit out of you! 

The game still has a bunch of bugs in the menus caused by the WebGL version (to retry exit the fullscreen and click retry in the small version) and of course some other ingame bugs, but I hope it's fine.

Theme inclusion: Less armor/clothes means more money, also the less time you have, the more merchants spawn.

Credits:

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/mini-pixel-7-font.html
